000000000010_00000_000_00001_0010011//addi x1, x0, 2 store 2 in register[1]
000000001001_00000_000_00010_0010011//addi x2, x2, 9 store 9 in register[2]
000000000000_00000_000_00011_0010011//addi x3, x0, 0 setting base address at x3
0000000_00001_00011_010_00000_0100011//sw x1, 0(x3)
0000000_00010_00011_000_00100_0100011//sb x2, 4(x3)
0000000_00001_00011_001_01000_0100011//sh x1, 8(x3)
000000000000_00011_010_00100_0000011//lw x4, 0(x3)
000000000100_00011_000_00101_0000011//lb x5, 4(x3)
000000001000_00011_001_00110_0000011//lh x6, 8(x3)
